compliant.section: This Privacy and Cookies Policy is provided by FitTech Co., Ltd. ("FitTech", or "we") to explain to you what personal data may be collected through the websites linked to this Policy and how such personal data may be used.
compliant.legal provisions: Information provided before the collection of personal data

compliant.section: If you have any questions or comments about this Policy, please contact us at service@fittech.com.tw.

We collect different categories of personal data on our websites (www.fittech.com.tw), which may include personal and business contact information such as your name, corporate name, job title, contact number, physical and email address, and other information you have provided or is required to process a transaction, service, inquiry or request.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: We may not be able to fulfill a request if we do not receive the personal data required.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: The personal data collected may be used to respond to your inquiries or requests such as replying to your inquiry of products, replying to your questions you submit, help us maintain and upgrade the quality of our websites and the services these websites provide, and any other use described at the point we collect the personal data.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: We may disclose your personal data to third party providers (in particular, to enable them to execute certain web services for us, such as web hosting or maintenance services).
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: We may also share this information with FitTechâ€™s affiliates and agents to fulfil your request for information/order.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: We do not sell any personally identifiable information.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: We reserve the right to disclose such personal data to any other third party if we believe that we are required or permitted to do so by law, including, where applicable, (i) to comply with legal processes or governmental requests; (ii) to prevent, investigate, detect or prosecute criminal offences or attacks on the technical integrity of the web site or our network; and (iii) to protect the rights, property or safety of FitTech, the users of the website, or the public.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

non_compliant.section: This Policy applies solely to the processing of your personal data which may be collected through our websites. The Internet pages to which our external links lead are not included.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state that it does not apply to third-party websites and that users should review the privacy policies of those websites.

non_compliant.section: To enable us to provide a better user experience, we also use cookies to collect certain information concerning your use of our websites such as the IP address of the computer you are using, the type of browser software and operating system that you use, and other similar information.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the specific purpose of using cookies and obtain explicit consent from users before storing or accessing cookies on their devices. It should also explain how users can withdraw their consent.

non_compliant.section: Our websites use cookies to collect certain information concerning your use of our websites, to improve your user experience, as well as to analyze and collect statistics regarding our web traffic.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the specific purpose of using cookies and obtain explicit consent from users before storing or accessing cookies on their devices. It should also explain how users can withdraw their consent.

non_compliant.section: Disabling cookies will make it impossible to use member-related functions
non_compliant.amend: The policy should not make consent to cookies a precondition for using the website's services if those services are not strictly necessary and require cookies. Users should be able to access basic website functionality without accepting cookies.
